# importing the relevant table

source:
# grouping all the rows by years to get an aggregate of cancer deaths
# in all countries for each year

cnc_grouped = cancer_types.groupby(['Year']).sum(cancer_types.all)
cnc_grouped.head()
#### Subplots showing the cancer types with the highest number of deaths

plt.style.use('fivethirtyeight')

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(27,18))

plot1 = fig.add_subplot(3,2,1)

sns.lineplot(x='Year', y='Lung cancer', color='red', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2, data=cnc_grouped)
plot1.set_title('Lung cancer by year')
plot1.set_xlabel('Year')
plot1.set_ylabel('Deaths')
plt.xticks(fontsize=20)
plt.yticks(fontsize=20)

plot2 = fig.add_subplot(3,2,2)

sns.lineplot(x='Year', y='Stomach cancer', color='blue', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2, data=cnc_grouped)
plot2.set_title('Stomach cancer by year')
plot2.set_xlabel('Year')
plot2.set_ylabel('Deaths')
plt.xticks(fontsize=20)
plt.yticks(fontsize=20)

plot3 = fig.add_subplot(3,2,3)

sns.lineplot(x='Year', y='Breast cancer', color='green', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2, data=cnc_grouped)
plot3.set_title('Breast cancer by year')
plot3.set_xlabel('Year')
plot3.set_ylabel('Deaths')
plt.xticks(fontsize=20)
plt.yticks(fontsize=20)

plot4 = fig.add_subplot(3,2,4)

sns.lineplot(x='Year', y='Prostate cancer', color='red', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2, data=cnc_grouped)
plot4.set_title('Prostate cancer by year')
plot4.set_xlabel('Year')
plot4.set_ylabel('Deaths')
plt.xticks(fontsize=20)
plt.yticks(fontsize=20)

plot5 = fig.add_subplot(3,2,5)

sns.lineplot(x='Year', y='Liver cancer', color='blue', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2, data=cnc_grouped)
plot5.set_title('Liver cancer by year')
plot5.set_xlabel('Year')
plot5.set_ylabel('Deaths')
plt.xticks(fontsize=20)
plt.yticks(fontsize=20)

plot6 = fig.add_subplot(3,2,6)

sns.lineplot(x='Year', y='Kidney cancer', color='green', linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2, data=cnc_grouped)
plot6.set_title('Kidney cancer by year')
plot6.set_xlabel('Year')
plot6.set_ylabel('Deaths')
plt.xticks(fontsize=20)
plt.yticks(fontsize=20)

fig.tight_layout()

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(10,7))

sns.lineplot(y='Lung cancer', x='Year', data=Nigeria, linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2)
plt.title('Lung cancer death rate in Nigeria')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()

source:
# renaming the 3rd column

tobacco = tbc.rename({'Deaths - Cause: Neoplasms - Risk: Smoking - OWID - Sex: Both - Age: Age-standardized (Percent)': 'Death_rate(percent)'}, axis=1)
tobacco

# querying only Nigeria's tobacco data belonging

tobacco_ng = tobacco.query('Entity == "Nigeria"')

fig = plt.figure(figsize=(10,7))

sns.lineplot(y='Death_rate(percent)', x='Year', data=tobacco_ng, linestyle='dashed', linewidth=2)
plt.title('Nigeria and the deaths attributed to tobbaco')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()
